ValidationRule.description: If Final WC Approval Complete is populated, the field Workers Compensation Type has to have a value in it and value can not equal "SR NO WC COI". Used for PEO Paper Based Onboarding.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
($RecordType.DeveloperName = 'PEO_Paper_Based_Onboarding' || $RecordType.Id = "0120g000000grzo")
&& NOT(ISBLANK(Reply_from_WC_Underwriting__c))&& OR( ISBLANK(TEXT(Workers_Compensation_Type__c )), ISPICKVAL(Workers_Compensation_Type__c , 'SR NO WC COI') )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: When Final WC Approval Complete is populated, the Workers Compensation Type cannot be blank or have the value 'SR NO WC COI'.
